name: RSI Aurora LN
description:
Manufacturer: RSI
Focus: Light Fighter
With a more robust shield generator and a pair of additional weapon hard points, the Legionnaire is a dedicated combat fighter, built to handle any obstacle the universe can throw at you.
description_cn:
制造商：RSI
定位： 轻型战斗机船
极光LN配备有一个更耐用的护盾生成器以及两个额外的武器挂点，它是一艘专业的战斗船，可以帮您解决宇宙中的任何障碍。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-亚伦环-德拉玛(Delamar)-列夫斯基(Levski)-TeachsShipShop
